Capture recapture is an estimation technique for the unknown size of an  population.



<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tyX79mPm2xY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
$$Sample 1 = m_1$$
$$Sample 2 = m_2$$
$$Recapture = b$$

$$ \hat N = \frac{(m_2*m_1)}{b}$$
